description: Looking for an easy lamb recipe? Then look no further than marinated midloin lamb chops served with a fresh barley, tomato and mint salad.
keywords: Minted Lamb Midloin Chops with Tomato and Barley Salad
name: Minted Lamb Midloin Chops with Tomato and Barley Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cooked barley, tomato and remaining mint in a serving dish. Top with beetroot, drizzle over remaining mint dressing and season with pepper. Cut remaining lemon into wedges. Serve chops with barley salad and lemon wedges.
